name: Slap the Fish
description:
#TeamSeas

It's simple just slap the fish by clicking on it

only mouse needed. 

All in-game grammatical errors are intentional (it makes it feel more silly)

click the fish 10 times to start the boss battle

move the mouse in the box if the soul gets too far out of the box your soul will take 5 damage per sec

         but if you're careful you can move your mouse out of the box and move your mouse in to teleport

          white attacks make you take damage ether way

for blue attacks stand completely still and you'll avoid it for orange attacks move to avoid it

to teleport,        you're meant to touch the edge the box and drag your mouse out and in without the heart going out of the box but I figured out that if you move your mouse really fast it would go way outside the box so my only solution was to give you damage if you go too far out.

Press h for easy mode the more you press it the easier it gets you can get up to 100 extra health per turn

Press L after the fight has started but before the second attack for hardcore mode where you only can survive 1 hit, and you're smaller so I can at least have 1 person willing to do it.

secret ending if you beat it without being hit

This game was really fun it was a silly idea from someone at my school as a joke but I actually made it. all credits go to Zoe from my school regarding the idea.

•the attack idea the music and sounds are all from undertale. -Toby fox
